name: Planet Domination
description:
Planet Domination

Planet Domination is a game in which each team must capture other planets. After 2 minutes, the team with the most planets wins!

Controls

Use WASD to move and Space to fire.

Notes

Created within 72 hours for LD38. I sprained part of my arm halfway through which made it difficult to type but I made it eventually.

You can find the original LD post Here.

Enjoy :D
